short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With ShopSmart, get the most out of your favourite online store. Popular deals and coupons are now just a click away.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically get the Deals/Coupon on store while you are browsing .Works with 500+ online stores in India.If you have used BuyHatke extension than you will surely like this.It works on many more stores on which BuyHatke works for e.g Yatra.com,MakeMytrip.com , OlaCabs and many more !

ShopSmart extension will automatically fetch the Active Coupons and Deals for the store you are browsing and bring it on the page automatically. 
Just click on the ShopSmart logo in the middle of page on left hand side and you can see all the Deals/Coupon on store.

It saves you the extra time and money - 
As you don't need Google for coupons  and You will surely save money by knowing about the latest coupons and Deals on the store.


ShopSmart supports  500+ online stores in India Top sites includes - Amazon ,Flipkart,Myntra,LensKart,Jabong,Dominos,SnapDeal,Zovi,FirstCry,BabyOye,MakeMyTrip,Yatra and many more !. Using ShopSmart you can save on almost all product categories like Electronics,Travel,Baby care,Home Decor,Clothing,Footwear,Accessories,Food,Mobile Recharge and many more!

This money saving extension will obviously be a Smart choice to shop online and hence named ShopSmart :)
